sentences.sContent: When the astigmatic degree< 1.50D, mydriatic optometry is of help to found the axis of cylindrical lens.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the astigmatic degree< 1.50D, mydriatic optometry is of help to found the axis of cylindrical lens.
sentences.sCn: 对于合并1.50D以下的散光患儿，散瞳验光可能更有助于确定柱镜的轴向。

remMethod.val: a + stigma(污点) + tic → 看不见污点 → 散光的

words.tran: [眼科] 散光；[光][电子] 像散性；[光][电子] 像散现象

trans.tranCn: 乱视的, 散光的,纠正散光的
trans.tranOther: relating to or affected with astigmatism
